attributes.action: Block entry to the UK of any Muslim suspected of being a Jihadist
attributes.additional_details:
Stop Jihadist's  re entering the UK. This is to prevent mass murder and other terrorist crimes happening on our streets. Also to prevent civil unrest by some of the indigenous population. Many if not all do not want another Lee Rigby murder happening.
Any person returning from a jihad should have their citizenship removed and returned to the country they have carried out this crime.
